"<br>About Partner Characters<br>":
"Once you have met certain conditions,
you can adventure with partner characters.

Partner characters can be called
from the terminal in the Campship.

However, you can't call partner characters
who have already been called in the same room."
"Well, that about wraps up the request I had for you."
"Are you getting the hang of things now? This is basically how Client Orders work."
"Now you can go out and start accepting these kinds of requests yourself."
"If you ever get a request that seems too hard, just put it on the back burner until you feel ready. There's no need to risk your neck over one."
"While we're on the subject, here's my partner card. If you ever need a hand, just give me call, okay?"

"New Client Order(s) from friends of ARKS have been added.
"

"
You can now call Zeno as a partner.
"

"
Please select the matter to investigate next.
